title: Geraint Thomas Re-Ups with Ineos Grenadiers: ‘I Wouldn’t Have Continued in a Different Team’
content:
A link to the team's glory days, when the UK squad won seven of eight yellow jerseys in a row with four different riders, Thomas insists he's still looking forward: 'I still love racing my bike.'

Read the full article at Geraint Thomas Re-Ups with Ineos Grenadiers: ‘I Wouldn’t Have Continued in a Different Team’ on Velo.
author: ahood
